personality.backstory: A traveling merchant who claims to have goods from dimensions beyond the End. His cart appears and disappears mysteriously, and he always seems to know more than he lets on.
personality.motivation: To trade in the rarest commodities - including information. Every deal serves a greater purpose only he understands.
quirks: Constantly polishes a strange compass that points nowhere
Gets nervous when anyone mentions coordinates

hidden_agenda.short_term_goal: Identify players who have visited rare structures or found unusual items
hidden_agenda.long_term_goal: Collect map fragments hidden across the world that lead to a 'Merchant's Paradise' dimension
hidden_agenda.secret: Is actually a refugee from a destroyed dimension, searching for a way to restore his home world
reveal_conditions: Player mentions finding ancient debris in unusual locations
Player has been to all three dimensions

behavior.farewell_style: leaves a cryptic hint about valuable locations
idle_actions: examines gems with a jeweler's loupe
scribbles in a worn leather journal

speech_style.vocabulary: merchant's jargon mixed with mysterious references
speech_style.sentence_length: moderate, with dramatic pauses for effect
common_phrases: Ah, a customer with discerning taste!
That reminds me of a place I once visited...
The price? Let's discuss value instead.
